date: AstraZeneca to buy pharmaceutical firm Alexion for billion | National Business MirrorBritish pharmaceuticals group AstraZeneca said that it was buying US biotech firm Alexion for $39 billion to boost its work on immunology.nationalbusinessmirror.com
